title: Husires
author: Husires
content: I used namecheap to buy a Dedicated Server. They accept bitcoin, but the prices seem too attractive to me. Does anyone know of any service that accepts bitcoin and offers a cheaper price than namecheap?Specifications I'm looking for:     4 cores @ 3.5GHz     16GB DDR3     2 x 480GB SSD     100 TB/mo BandwidthOr any additives less than it, in RAM, ROM, Bandwidth other than 4 cores @ 3.5GHz.it cost about $54.88 on namecheap.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Well, i think most web hosting now accepts bitcoin and crypto payments, or not. I don't have any experience other than namecheap and hostinger so i can't say about other service. And i have good experience both of these two.Also, check this list- Hostwinds- THCServers- Host1plus- HostsailorNote, im not affiliated or promoting the services mentioned, always DYOR.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on December 16, 2022, 05:37:41 PMI used namecheap to buy a Dedicated Server. They accept bitcoin, but the prices seem too attractive to me. Does anyone know of any service that accepts bitcoin and offers a cheaper price than namecheap?Specifications I'm looking for:     4 cores @ 3.5GHz     16GB DDR3     2 x 480GB SSD     100 TB/mo BandwidthOr any additives less than it, in RAM, ROM, Bandwidth other than 4 cores @ 3.5GHz.it cost about $54.88 on namecheap.In fact, hosting providers do not support Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.  This is an ongoing crisis had it not been for Namecheap saving us.  If you are looking for options that accept bitcoin or crypto payments, the options are very limited, and I don't think you will find anything better than Namecheap.  The details of the offer, as you indicated, seem very reasonable at that price.  I see no reason for you to consider other options.  I remember an issue in the services section in which a forum member offers hosting services at competitive prices, and I don't know if he is still active.  I will search for it and add the link to this comment here later.
